experience.description: Development of a Virtual Reality Game for a Research Project focused on local food culture heritage, where you can learn how to prepare two traditional dishes by cooking them in VR.
I worked as a UI Designer developing UI and UX for two big projects: the first is based on AR technology and is actually used by the Italian Airforce.
I designed 2D and 3D for websites, smartphone and desktop applications, as well as animated asset for the motion graphics, working side by side with the software developers.
